description:
When recreating the default SR or using certain XenAPI configurations, the method currently used for finding the default does not work - resulting in a stack trace when you try and use that nova.

The default value for sr_matching_filter should be to use the pool-specified default SR.
title: XenAPI Default SR depends on obscure i18n key

    XenAPI: Change the default SR to be the pool default
    
    The default SR should be the pools default - but it might be unset
    if a host has been removed from a host aggregate (i.e. removed from
    the pool).  In this case make sure that we do give a decent error
    message.
    
    DocImpact - need to regenerate the defaults doc
